mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.couse_id AS "couseId", a.single_title AS "singleTitle", a.answerA AS "answera", a.answerB AS "answerb", a.answerC AS "answerc", a.answerD AS "answerd", a.single_answer AS "singleAnswer", a.degree AS "degree", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.is_delete AS "isDelete"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO singlechoice( id, couse_id, single_title, answerA, answerB, answerC, answerD, single_answer, degree, create_time, is_delete ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{couseId}, #{singleTitle}, #{answera}, #{answerb}, #{answerc}, #{answerd}, #{singleAnswer}, #{degree}, #{createTime}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE singlechoice SET couse_id = #{couseId}, single_title = #{singleTitle}, answerA = #{answera}, answerB = #{answerb}, answerC = #{answerc}, answerD = #{answerd}, single_answer = #{singleAnswer}, degree = #{degree}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
